meanings.definition: Relating to or denoting an organism that contains genetic material artificially introduced from another species.
meanings.sent1: The transgenic plants grew taller than the regular ones.
meanings.sent2: Scientists created transgenic mice for their research.
meanings.sent3: The transgenic tomatoes decided to have a party in the greenhouse.
meanings.sent4: Her transgenic ideas spread through the group like wildfire.
meanings.sent5: The transgenic flowers bloomed in vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: An organism that contains genetic material artificially introduced from another species.
meanings.sent1: The farmer was amazed by the transgenic sheep in his barn.
meanings.sent2: The transgenic fish swam gracefully in the tank.
meanings.sent3: The transgenic chicken told jokes to the other farm animals.
meanings.sent4: The transgenic tree stood out among the rest in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The transgenic cat had unique fur patterns.
